name: Rachael's Chicken Shawarma
ingredients: 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons Yocheese or Greek yogurt
4 low carb pita breads or tortillas, optional (not included in the counts)

instructions.en: Combine all sauce ingredients in a small bowl and chill until serving time.
Mix all chicken seasoning ingredients (except chicken) to form a paste.
Rub the seasoning paste all over the chicken to coat well.
Grill the chicken about 3 minutes per side until just done. Don't overcook.
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Cook onions and peppers until slightly charred and onions are caramelized. Season with salt and pepper.
Serve sliced chicken with peppers and top with yogurt-tahini sauce. Optionally, serve in pita bread or tortillas.

notes: * You'll need 1 lemon total for the whole recipe. ** Cardamom is optional; the recipe author preferred it without. This recipe makes 4 servings. The chicken can be frozen but not the peppers. Low carb pita breads or tortillas are optional and not included in nutritional counts.
